description: Ersin Tatar, who is pro-Turkey and wants Cyprus to be two separate states, is elected president.
title: Northern Cyprus: Right-wing nationalist Ersin Tatar elected president
title_page: Northern Cyprus: Right-wing nationalist Ersin Tatar elected president - BBC News
maintext: The self-declared Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus (TRNC) - which has a population of around 300,000 - is recognised as an independent state only by Turkey, while the rest of the world sees it as part of Cyprus.
